Name: Can You Believe It? Stories and Idioms from Real Life, Book 3

ReviewList.Text: The stories in this book are heart-warming and promote lively classroom discussions.  In addition, it teaches many, many idioms in context.  Excellent!
I have been using several units with my students and they really like it. It has different short passages with several most common idioms and the exercises are awesome.
I've used this book in two intermediate ESL classes now, and these stories are a good way to teach idioms and reading comprehension.
This book is for my English as a second language class. To learn the daily used English, this book is wonderful.
This book is very helpful for ESL students! I was lucky to find this book. I strongly recommend this book to everyone who studies English as a second language~

This is a terrific book for teaching idioms and expressions and more.  The stories are in the form of an article so they are to the point and not too long. I use this in my one on one tutor class and it is a great jumping off point for further conversation.  But the absolute best part is when my student's eyes light up when he finally can make sense of a phrase he has been hearing in conversations.  We have cleared up so many simple language stumbling blocks with this book,  it has given both of us a feeling of accomplishment. I would highly recommend this book for someone with basic English language skills.
The book was in perfect conditions as advertised. I received the book before I expected. Good seller.
A great workbook for teaching conversational English.
That's it, I got the book, Thank you very much.
